title: Google Messages will get end-to-end encryption for RCS group chats ‘later this year’ in beta
content:
While it wasn’t mentioned on stage during Google I/O 2022 today, the company did announce a big new feature coming to Google Messages. Later this year, Google Messages will add end-to-end encryption for RCS group chats.

more…

The post Google Messages will get end-to-end encryption for RCS group chats ‘later this year’ in beta appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has announced that RCS will make group chat encryption available "later this year," but only in beta at first.
